scripts.compress: cd package; zip -r ../insertSchedules.zip .; cd ../; zip insertSchedules.zip app.py
scripts.deploy:create: aws lambda create-function --function-name insertSchedules --runtime 'python3.9' --role LAMBDA_ROLE --zip-file 'fileb://index.zip' --handler index.handler
scripts.update: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run compress && npm run deploy:update
